exclusion: Pressing tamper key three times within 1.5 seconds to enter the exclusion mode
inclusion: Pressing the tamper key three times within 1.5 seconds to enter the inclusion mode.
label: PAT02-B
overview: The flood multisensor PAT02 has flood, temperature and humidity, 3 sensors function in one, based on Z-WaveTM technology
wakeup: Press the tamper key once. The device will wake-up 10 seconds.

parameters.label: Operation Mode
parameters.description: set Operation Mode using bit to control
parameters.overview:
set Operation Mode using bit to control

  • Bit 0: Reserve
  • Bit 1: Reserve
  • Bit 2: Reserve
  • Bit 3: Setting temperature scale
    • 0: Fahrenheit
    • 1: Celsius
  • Bit 4: Reserve
  • Bit 5: Reserve
  • Bit 6: Reserve
  • Bit 7: Reserve

parameters.label: Customer Function
parameters.description: Customer Function switch using bit control
parameters.overview:
Customer Function switch using bit control

  • Bit 0: Reserve
  • Bit 1: Reserve
  • Bit 2: Reserve
  • Bit 3: not applicable for this device variant, set to 0
  • Bit 4: Notification Type
    • 0: Using Notification Report
    • 1: Using Sensor Binary Report
  • Bit 5: Disable Multi CC in auto report
    • 0: Enable
    • 1: Disable
  • Bit 6: not applicable for this device variant, set to 0
  • Bit 7: Reserve

parameters.label: Auto Report Battery Time
parameters.description: The interval time for auto reporting the battery level.
parameters.overview:
The interval time for auto reporting the battery level.

  • 0 = Turn off auto report battery.
  • 1-127 = Number of ticks. The default value is 12. The tick time can be set by configuration No. 20.

parameters.label: Auto Report Temperature Time
parameters.description: The interval time for auto reporting the temperature state.
parameters.overview:
The interval time for auto reporting the temperature state.

  • 0 = Turn off auto report temperature.
  • 1-127 = Number of ticks. The default value is 12. The tick time can be set by configuration No. 20.

parameters.label: Auto Report Humidity Time
parameters.description: The interval time for auto reporting the humidity state.
parameters.overview:
The interval time for auto reporting the humidity state.

  • 0 = Turn off auto report.
  • 1-127 = Number of ticks. The default value is 12. The tick time can be set by configuration No. 20.

parameters.label: Auto Report Tick Interval
parameters.description: The interval time for auto report each tick.
parameters.overview:
The interval time for auto report each tick. Units of one minute. Setting configuration will affect configuration no. 10, 13, 14 and 15.

  • Caution1: Setting to 0 means turn off all auto report function.
  • Caution2: The value is unsigned byte.

parameters.label: Temperature Differential Report
parameters.overview:
The temperature differential to report.

  • The unit is Fahrenheit.
  • Enable this function the device will detect every 10 seconds.

parameters.label: Humidity Differential Report
parameters.overview:
The humidity differential to report.

  • The unit is percentage.
  • Enable this function the device will detect every 10 seconds.
